title: Penne all'Arrabbiata
ingredients: ['1 (500g) pack penne pasta', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, sliced', '2 (70g) packs pancetta, chopped', '3 tablespoons capers', '50g (2 oz) fresh sliced mushrooms', '50g (2 oz) green olives, pitted and halved', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried crushed chillies', '3 anchovy fillets, rinsed and chopped', '1 pinch salt', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '150ml (5 fl oz) red wine', '3 (400g) tins whole plum tomatoes', '6 leaves fresh basil']
